org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Interface IAeDeploymentInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeDeploymentInfo
public interface IAeDeploymentInfo

This interface defines the methods necessary to implement an object that represents the deployment result for a single PDD in a BPR.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getLog()
          Gets the deployment log for this PDD.
 int getNumErrors()
          Gets the number of errors found when deploying this PDD.
 int getNumWarnings()
          Gets the number of warnings found when deploying this PDD.
 java.lang.String getPddName()
          Returns the name of the PDD for this deployment.
 boolean isDeployed()
          Returns a flag indicating if the PDD was deployed.
 org.w3c.dom.Element toElement(org.w3c.dom.Document aDom)
          Converts this deployment info object into an XML element.
 

Method Detail

Returns the name of the PDD for this deployment.

Returns a flag indicating if the PDD was deployed.
